channel.title: CVE Feed for FUJITSU LIMITED and PFU LIMITED -- The installers of ScanSnap Manager and the Software Download Installer
channel.description: The latest CVEs for FUJITSU LIMITED and PFU LIMITED -- The installers of ScanSnap Manager and the Software Download Installer

item.title: CVE-2021-20722|2024-08-03T17:53:21.807Z -- fujitsu%20limited%20and%20pfu%20limited -- the%20installers%20of%20scansnap%20manager%20and%20the%20software%20download%20installer
item.description: Untrusted search path vulnerability in the installers of ScanSnap Manager prior to versions V7.0L20 and the Software Download Installer prior to WinSSInst2JP.exe and WinSSInst2iX1500JP.exe allows an attacker to gain privileges and execute arbitrary code with the privilege of the user invoking the installer via a Trojan horse DLL in an unspecified directory.
